text: Hit the Lights are an American pop punk band. Hit the Lights may also refer to: * "Hit the Lights" (Metallica song), from Kill 'em All * Hit the Lights (India Tour Edition), a compilation album by Jay Sean * Hit the Lights (Japan Edition), compilation album by Jay Sean * "Hit the Lights" (Jay Sean song) * "Hit the Lights" (Selena Gomez & the Scene song)
title: Hit the Lights (disambiguation)
